name: Happiness Is an Illusion
description:
2019
2531 px × 3483px
Ink and digital
°
I may not really believe in pursuing happiness or happiness in general. Maybe, what i really need is warmth. It's beyond happiness, or butterfly in my stomach, or something like that. It's like a vague and subtle clouds that brings calmness and peace of mind most of the time. It's not like happiness that feels like sun, it'll struck me like a beam of sunshine and eventually slowly fade away. And then comes back again. Just like time, that feels like illusion sometimes. It's like neverending cycle of reality check.
